Title: Hitchcock
Actors: Anthony Hopkins, Helen Mirren, Scarlett Johansson, Danny Huston
Plot: The relationship between Alfred Hitchcock and his wife Alma Reville during the filming of Psycho (1960) in 1959 is explored.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 5 wins & 28 nominations.
Production: Fox Searchlight, Dune, Montecito Picture Company
